subject: Re: (3.8) NullPointerException from ComparisonFailure
msgSnippet: ... You are right, it hit me today, too. I posted a bug report to sourceforge: http://makeashorterlink.com/?W230323A1 Just realized that there already was a
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., Shaun Smith <shauns@p...> wrote:
> I have a feeling this will catch a few people out.

You are right, it hit me today, too.

I posted a bug report to sourceforge:
http://makeashorterlink.com/?W230323A1


Just realized that there already was a patch posted:
http://makeashorterlink.com/?E210523A1

As far as I can tell, it isn't fixed in CVS yet.

Regards, Ilja
